bio: Hello!  I am just a big sweetie pie who loves to be held.  Don't let my size fool you, I am very energetic! I am fun loving and willing to learn.  If I am the one for you, come see me soon!
name: Matty

bio: Hello!  Are you looking for a puppy to cuddle?  Well look no more - your lap and love would be heaven to me. Come meet me soon - I am waiting!
name: Flag

bio: Hello!  I am very social and affectionate and I get along with everyone. I could be a wonderful addition to your family. Please stop by soon!
name: Pickle

bio: Hello!  I am a great friend who is happy lounging on the couch with you but can also keep up with you on your long walks (or even jogs). I am very smart and just need a good friend to teach me all the things I need to be a great dog.  So if I sound like what you are looking for please come meet me and make me a part of your family!
name: Fly

bio: Hello!  I am just a big sweetie pie with a huge loving heart!  I am a lot of fun and just love to hangout with my favorite people.  I am happy lounging on the couch with you but I also enjoy a nice walk to check out the neighborhood.  If you are looking for a sweet dog like me, come give me a chance to win your heart!
name: Prince

bio: Hello!  I am just a huge cuddle bug!  I love to snuggle and be tucked in at night.  There's nowhere else I'd rather be than by your side! If you are looking for a loving and affectionate companion, I might be the one for you!  Come see me soon!
name: Parker

bio: Hello!  I am a young and high spirited dog who loves to play with toys.  I am smart and fun loving and just need a great friend to teach me how to be the best dog ever!  If I sound like the right match for you, come see me soon!
name: Mittens

bio: Hello!  I am a great friend who is happy lounging on the couch with you but can also keep up with you on your long walks (or even jogs). I am very smart and just need a good friend to teach me all the things I need to be a great dog.  So if I sound like what you are looking for please come meet me and make me a part of your family!
name: Poppy

bio: Hello!  I am a fun loving gal who is looking for a new best friend to play fetch with! I can also relax and hang out in front of the TV with you.  If you think I might be the right match for you, come meet me soon!
name: Jezzie

bio: Hello! I am a friendly dog with lots of energy! I am looking for experienced owner who can help me be the best dog I can be. I would be a great companion for someone who likes to go on long walks and has a backyard for me to run around in! Come visit me soon and you can be my forever home!
name: Polo

bio: Hello!  I am just a big sweetie pie who loves to be held.  Don't let my size fool you, I can be energetic!  I love to go for long walks and may even be great for agility classes!  I am fun loving and willing to learn.  If I am the one for you, come see me soon!
name: Sammy
